comments.content: It must be a slanted **[HY Kak Headline (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003228/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=HY%20Kak%20Headline%20Std%20-%20B%20Bold&fid=7be597c759c69aa09112623db99c57a1&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Freestyle%20Judo&fit=1)** [1996, Adobe]
Wow! That does seem to match. Thank you very much!!!!
Actually, the latin counterpart of HY Kak Headline is [Impact](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003228/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Impact). So no need to search for it and simply go with Impact.
Your are right Ryuk, I confused by the thick outline of the sample ;)
